page.title: 16Jerusalem Times
page.content: Ida Ivy insists the tomb was empty on the first day of the week. "I grow by the entrance and saw it all. A man, not the owner, was{buried}hastily on Friday evening. Come Sunday sunrise, no body! Grave sheets still in place and a heavy bag of spices, but men in white were saying he was{risen}". Our reporter got no reply when he knocked at the Upper Room. *** *** {*** }*** *** "My stripes nearly fell off when fiery {tongues}settled on the men's heads". Bumble Benbee says he just droned in, and met with a loud buzz of excitement in many languages. Outside, the sound of high{wind}attracted a crowd as Ben left hastily. Yet there was no breeze, he is certain. The shaken bee did not stay for the{sermon}but returned in a daze to the hive; his Queen believes that he had witnessed the{Holy Spirit.
